Segment.name: M15
Segment.comment: To notify Customs of in-bond cargo movement or of a conveyance arrival or departure, or of transfer of custodial liability when an in-bond movement involves multiple legs

Field.name: ReferenceIdentification1
Field.comment: Reference information as defined for a particular Transaction Set or as specified by the Reference Identification Qualifier

Field.name: Date
Field.comment: Date expressed as CCYYMMDD where CC represents the first two digits of the calendar year

Field.name: LocationIdentifier
Field.comment: Code which identifies a specific location

Field.name: Time
Field.comment: Time expressed in 24-hour clock time as follows: HHMM, or HHMMSS, or HHMMSSD, or HHMMSSDD, where H = hours (00-23), M = minutes (00-59), S = integer seconds (00-59) and DD = decimal seconds; decimal seconds are expressed as follows: D = tenths (0-9) and DD = hundredths (00-99)

Field.name: SealNumber
Field.comment: Unique number on seal used to close a shipment

Field.name: ReferenceIdentification2
Field.comment: Reference information as defined for a particular Transaction Set or as specified by the Reference Identification Qualifier

Field.name: StateOrProvinceCode
Field.comment: Code (Standard State/Province) as defined by appropriate government agency

Field.name: YesNoConditionOrResponseCode
Field.comment: Code indicating a Yes or No condition or response

Field.name: ReferenceIdentification3
Field.comment: Reference information as defined for a particular Transaction Set or as specified by the Reference Identification Qualifier

Field.name: VesselName
Field.comment: Name of ship as documented in "Lloyd's Register of Ships"

Field.name: TransportationMethodTypeCode
Field.comment: Code specifying the method or type of transportation for the shipment

SyntaxNote.name: R0410
SyntaxNote.comment: At least one of M1504 or M1510 is required.

SyntaxNote.name: C1110
SyntaxNote.comment: If M1511 is present, then M1510 is required.

SyntaxNote.name: P1314
SyntaxNote.comment: If either M1513 or M1514 is present, then the other is required.

SyntaxNote.name: C1516
SyntaxNote.comment: If M1515 is present, then M1516 is required.

SyntaxNote.name: P1819
SyntaxNote.comment: If either M1518 or M1519 is present, then the other is required.
